thread.title: Best location and perfect style: Modern yet Parisean!
thread.title_full: Best location and perfect style: Modern yet Parisean! - Review of Castille Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Laura B
title: Best location and perfect style: Modern yet Parisean!
text:
I absolutely loved my stay at Castille, not only was it in the BEST location ever (safest and most beautiful neighbourhood, perfectly could walk to a ton of touristy spots and also restaurants and shops) but its also in a quiet street so its very very very quiet and relaxing. The whole building is remodeled yet it keeps its Parisian style. We stayed at the duplex and I 100% recommend it!!! Beautiful bathroom and very cozy bed, with amazing big window. Breakfast was wonderful and so many options of every kind, it has a beautiful outdoor patio but we went there in the winter and of course it was too cold to eat out. We also used the gym although small, it does have all you need for a quick workout. VERY VERY RECOMMENDABLE for a Paris stay!
Room Tip: duplex rooms are stunning See more room tips
